name: Sweet Memory - Wildlife Fantasies
description:
Sweet Memory - Wildlife Fantasies is a memory card game with animal themed card decks.

Featuring wildlife photography generously provided by Pixabay.

Play for FREE in your browser or on PC.

Features:
  • Choose from one of four different card decks
  • Play for score and spend your points to unlock the gallery, which includes full size pictures of the playing cards + bonus pictures
  • Your progress is saved automatically, so you can just enjoy playing
  • Change settings anytime and return to your game in progress - no interruptions
  • Choose higher difficulty for a wider variety of cards and the chance to earn more points faster
  • Browser version is touch friendly and playable on any device (PC, phone, tablet)
  • Download versions available for PC / Windows, Linux, MacOS, and Smartphone/Tablet
